summary:
What this mod does:

- Fixes two verticles in the mesh that were causing the pommel texture to stretch onto the handle. Praise to Nifskope and Blender.

- Full retexture of the weapon, including the scabbard. Now it should look much less glowy and a bit more immersive. Praise Nifskope for UV map export and GIMP for texture
descriptionHtml:
Malacath's Cleaver

Basically my first mod (of a mod). 

You need Hothtrooper's Immersive Weapons (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644) for this to work. The original weapon mesh was made by Urwy and can be found in his 'URW Useless Resources - Weapons' pack (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12087). If there is any issue with this mod, please contact me. 

What this mod does:

- Fixes two verticles in the mesh that were causing the pommel texture to stretch onto the handle. Praise to Nifskope and Blender. 

- Full retexture of the weapon, including the scabbard. Now it should look much less glowy and a bit more immersive. Praise Nifskope for UV map export and GIMP for texture creation.
author: D3humaniz3d
